value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Learn how to host your domain on Azure DNS.

value.title: Plan and manage your Azure costs
value.excerpt: Migration to the cloud presents new ways to think about your IT expenses. This module teaches you about the factors that influence cost and tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend.

value.title: Secure network connectivity on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about the Azure services you can use to help ensure that your network is safe, secure, and trusted.

value.title: Choose the best tools to help organizations build better solutions
value.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft tools and services that help developers and operations engineers build modern solutions for the cloud and on-premises.

value.title: Create an Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

value.title: Define identity and access management in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity and access management in Azure Active Directory and why identity is a core component of your organizationâ€™s security posture.

value.title: Choose the best Azure serverless technology for your compute scenario
value.excerpt: Examine Azure's serverless technologies and choose the right service for your scenario.

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Monitor data drift with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Changing trends in data over time can reduce the accuracy of the predictions made by a model. Monitoring for this data drift is an important way to ensure your model continues to predict accurately.

value.title: AZ-104: Prerequisites for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn the basic concepts you'll need to know as an Azure administrator and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Build a cloud governance strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Fundamentals of computer networking
topItems.excerpt: You'll learn the fundamental principles of computer networking to prepare you for the Azure admin and developer learning paths.

topItems.title: Fundamentals of network security
topItems.excerpt: Explore the fundamentals of computer networking security and monitoring.

value.title: Linux on Azure
value.excerpt: This comprehensive learning path reviews deployment and management of Linux on Azure. Learn about cloud computing concepts, Linux IaaS and PaaS solutions and benefits and Azure cloud services. Discover how to migrate and extend your Linux-based workloads on Azure with improved scalability, security, and privacy.

topItems.title: Discuss Azure fundamental concepts
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different types and categories of cloud computing.

topItems.title: Introduction to Linux on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discover the unique benefits of running Linux on Azure, and how to run Linux-based applications and workloads in the cloud with Azure.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

value.title: Prerequisites for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn the basic concepts you'll need to know as an Azure administrator.

topItems.title: Build a cloud governance strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Fundamentals of computer networking
topItems.excerpt: You'll learn the fundamental principles of computer networking to prepare you for the Azure admin and developer learning paths.

topItems.title: Fundamentals of network security
topItems.excerpt: Explore the fundamentals of computer networking security and monitoring.

value.title: Choose the best Azure IoT service for your application
value.excerpt: Examine Azure IoT services, and choose the right service for your scenario.

value.title: Secure access to your applications by using Azure identity services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Active Directory, single sign-on (SSO), multifactor authentication, and Conditional Access can help you manage and secure identities on Azure.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Introduction to Azure
value.excerpt: Create your first virtual machine as you discover the power of Azure cloud computing and storage, along with services that help you explore new software paradigms.

value.title: Simplify access and identity provisioning with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity governance and how you can safeguard access to your organizationâ€™s data.

value.title: Strengthen authentication (conditional access) with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about modern authentication and the security benefits it provides to your organization, such as enabling multi-factor authentication and a passwordless environment.

value.title: Improve your cloud security posture with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: Learn how you can strengthen your security posture through Azure Security Center.

value.title: How to use Azure Orbital to communicate with your satellites | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Orbital is a fully managed cloud-based ground station as a service that enables you to communicate with your spacecraft or satellite constellations, downlink and uplink data, process your data in the cloud, chain services with Azure services in unique scenarios, and generate products for your customers.

value.title: Create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
value.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

value.title: Build AI solutions with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning is a cloud platform for training, deploying, managing, and monitoring machine learning models. Learn how to use the Azure Machine Learning Python SDK to create enterprise-ready machine learning solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Azure Machine Learning SDK
topItems.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning provides a cloud-based platform for training, deploying, and managing machine learning models.

topItems.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

topItems.title: Work with Data in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning.

topItems.title: Work with Compute in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage compute contexts for experiments in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Examine privacy, compliance, and data protection standards on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft's commitment to privacy, how Azure adheres to common regulatory and compliance standards, and additional considerations government agencies need to make.

value.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
value.excerpt: Learn about the Azure global network of physical datacenters, the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and Microsoft service guarantees.

value.title: Safeguard your environment with Azure Advanced Threat Protection
value.excerpt: Learn about the Azure Advanced Threat Protection component of Microsoft Threat Protection.

value.title: Choose the best tools for managing and configuring your Azure environment
value.excerpt: Explore the Azure management, administration, and reporting tools, and choose the ones that best meet your organization's needs.

value.title: Choose the best monitoring service for visibility, insight, and mitigation of service outages
value.excerpt: Discover solutions that help IT organizations with insights into the health and performance of their applications running in the cloud.
